other_tests.findings: Enlarged thyroid gland with homogeneously increased tracer uptake; total thyroid uptake of technetium-99m was 8.6% (4.5% in the right lobe, and 4.1% in the left lobe) which is above the normal range of 0.5 to 1.7%.
Sinus tachycardia at a rate of 120 beats per minute; otherwise normal.
Diffusely enlarged thyroid tissue with features consistent with partially treated Gravesâ€™ disease.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-surgery, the patient experienced temporary hypocalcemia but improved within 2 months.
